method.name: findByPath
method.description:
Searches all descendants (children, grand-children, etc.), including self, by given path.

returns:Gradle project with matching path or null if not found.

method.name: getBuildDirectory
method.description:
Returns the build directory for this project.

returns:The build directory.
(since 2.0) @throws UnsupportedMethodException For Gradle versions older than 2.0, where this method is not supported.

method.name: getBuildScript
method.description:
Returns the build script for this project.

returns:The build script.
(since 1.8) @throws UnsupportedMethodException For Gradle versions older than 1.8, where this method is not supported.

method.name: getPath
method.description:
Returns the path of this project. This is a unique identifier for this project within the build.

returns:The path.

method.name: getProjectDirectory
method.description:
Returns the project directory for this project.

returns:The project directory.
(since 2.4) @throws UnsupportedMethodException For Gradle versions older than 2.4, where this method is not supported.

method.name: getProjectIdentifier
method.description:
Returns the identifier for this Gradle project.
(since 2.13)

property.name: buildDirectory
property.description:
Returns the build directory for this project.

returns:The build directory.
(since 2.0) @throws UnsupportedMethodException For Gradle versions older than 2.0, where this method is not supported.

returns:The build script.

returns:The path.

returns:The project directory.
(since 2.4) @throws UnsupportedMethodException For Gradle versions older than 2.4, where this method is not supported.

property.name: projectIdentifier

(since 2.13)
